titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey to John W. Underhill
CWG13980

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
485
March 16th 5
Lieut
John W. Underhill
Bowling Green Ky
Sir:
Yours of Jany 13th to Gov Bramlette, has been refered to this Office for answer.
It is not deemed advisable at present to increase the number of State troops already in the field --

Very Respectfully
D. W. Lindsey
Adjutant Genl Ky
